channel.title: Maintenance on Straight 6 Serenade
channel.description: Recent content in Maintenance on Straight 6 Serenade

item.title: Alternator Replacement
item.description:
Today was initally supposed to be replacing the catless but i went out to start the car and got nothing. My battery was completely dead, turns out the was undercharging the battery and letting it didnt help it either.

anyway i sourced a new-used alternator, and got to work. this isnt a diy per say but to get to the alternator, the fan and intake needs to be removed.
